It belongs to the family Lepidoziaceae and is characterized by its dense, mat-forming growth habit with small, scale-like leaves. The plant produces spore-bearing structures called sporophytes, which are typically clustered at the base of the foliage. Due to its limited distribution and habitat specificity, Pseudoraphis balansae is considered a vulnerable species.
